text: Yesterday is history, tomorrow is a mystery, but today is a gift. That is why it is called the present.
author: Master Oogway

text: There is no secret ingredient.
author: Mr. Ping

text: One often meets his destiny on the road he takes to avoid it.
author: Master Oogway

text: Skadoosh.
author: Po

text: There are no accidents.
author: Master Oogway

text: If you only do what you can do, you will never be more than you are now.
author: Master Shifu

text: Your story may not have such a happy beginning, but that doesn't make you who you are. It is the rest of your story, who you choose to be.
author: Soothsayer

text: Inner peace... inner peace...
author: Master Shifu

text: I'm not a big fat panda. I'm THE big fat panda.
author: Po

text: Finally, a worthy opponent! Our battle will be legendary!
author: Tai Lung

text: When will you realize? The more you take, the less you have.
author: Master Oogway

text: My fist hungers for justice! That was my... fist.
author: Po

text: You must let go of the illusion of control.
author: Master Oogway

text: See, that's the thing, Shen. Scars heal.
author: Po

text: Happiness must be taken, and I will take mine.
author: Lord Shen

text: Quit, don't quit. Noodles, don't noodles.
author: Master Oogway

text: The real warrior never quits.
author: Po

text: The dead exist in the past, and I must tend to the future.
author: Lord Shen

text: My time has come.
author: Master Oogway

text: Anything is possible when you have inner peace.
author: Master Shifu

text: I am the Dragon Warrior!
author: Po

text: Your mind is like this water, my friend. When it is agitated, it becomes difficult to see. But if you allow it to settle, the answer becomes clear.
author: Master Oogway

text: Before the battle of the fist, comes the battle of the mind.
author: Master Shifu

text: Every master must find his path to inner peace.
author: Master Shifu

text: Who are you? ... I've been asking the same question. Am I the son of a panda? The son of a goose? A student? A teacher? Turns out, I'm all of them.
author: Po

text: You can chain my body, but you will never chain my warrior spirit!
author: Crane

text: Ah, Shifu. There is just news. There is no good or bad.
author: Master Oogway

text: Look at this tree, Shifu. I cannot make it blossom when it suits me, nor make it bear fruit before its time.
author: Master Oogway

text: I'm not hungry... Master.
author: Po

text: My friend, the panda will never fulfill his destiny, nor you yours, until you let go of the illusion of control.
author: Master Oogway

text: Quit, don't quit. Noodles, don't noodles... You are too concerned with what was and what will be. There's a saying: Yesterday is history, tomorrow is a mystery, but today is a gift. That is why it is called the present.
author: Master Oogway

text: The secret ingredient is... nothing!
author: Mr. Ping

text: To make something special you just have to believe it's special.
author: Mr. Ping

text: There's no charge for awesomeness... or attractiveness.
author: Po

text: Legend tells of a legendary warrior whose kung fu skills were the stuff of legend.
author: Po

text: He was so deadly, in fact, his enemies would go blind from over-exposure to pure awesomeness!
author: Po

text: Your story may not have such a happy beginning, but that doesn't make you who you are. It is the rest of your story, who you choose to be.
author: Soothsayer

text: No they don't. Wounds heal.
author: Lord Shen

text: You gotta let go of that stuff from the past because it just doesn't matter. The only thing that matters is what you choose to be now.
author: Po

text: How can kung fu stop something that stops kung fu?
author: Po

text: Ah. My old enemy... stairs!
author: Po

text: I'm not freaking out, I'm freaking in.
author: Po

text: If you only do what you can do, you will never be more than you are now.
author: Master Shifu

text: But I like who I am!
author: Po

text: You don't even know who you are!
author: Master Shifu

text: Time is just an illusion, there is only the now.
author: Master Shifu

text: I'm not trying to turn you into me. I'm trying to turn you into you.
author: Master Shifu

text: Sometimes we do the wrong things for the good reasons.
author: Mr. Ping

text: I've been asking myself that question. Am I the son of a panda? The son of a goose? A student? A teacher? I'm all of those things. I am the Dragon Warrior!
author: Po

text: Now, who wants to do the right thing for the wrong reasons?
author: Zhen

text: That is awesome! I mean, it's disturbing, but it's awesome!
author: Po

text: I'm only hungry for one thing... Vengeance!
author: Granny Boar

text: Worrying doesn't make the broth boil any faster.
author: Mr. Ping

text: Oogway made a mistake choosing you as the Dragon Warrior. I just didn't realize how big a mistake it was until now.
author: Tai Lung

text: Yesterday is history, tomorrow is a mystery.
author: Master Oogway

text: Today is a gift. That is why it is called the present.
author: Master Oogway

text: Your mind is like this water.
author: Master Oogway

text: If you only do what you can do, you will never be more than you are now.
author: Master Shifu

text: There's no charge for awesomeness.
author: Po

text: Inner peace. Inner peace.
author: Master Shifu

text: You just need to believe.
author: Master Oogway

text: One often meets his destiny on the road he takes to avoid it.
author: Master Oogway

text: You are too concerned with what was and what will be.
author: Master Oogway

text: There is always something more to learn.
author: Master Shifu

text: You gotta let go of the past.
author: Po

text: The panda lives.
author: Lord Shen

text: So, who are you, panda?
author: Soothsayer

text: It was never my destiny to stop you.
author: Master Oogway

text: You must believe.
author: Po

text: Chi is a part of you.
author: Master Shifu

text: I am not a big fat panda. I am THE big fat panda!
author: Po

text: You have to let go of who you were.
author: Master Shifu

text: Everything he has created!
author: Kai

text: I too came from humble beginnings.
author: The Chameleon

text: Maybe Oogway was right about you.
author: Tai Lung

text: You aren't completely useless after all.
author: Tai Lung

text: Change is part of the journey.
author: Zhen

text: You are ready.
author: Po

text: The journey makes you stronger.
author: Po

text: It is time to become who you are meant to be.
author: Po

text: I see you like to chew. Maybe you should chew... ON MY FIST!
author: Gang Boss
